name: Persian Literature: The Epic Tradition
description: Explores iconic masterpieces of classical Persian heroic and romantic epic poetry, including the Persian national epic, Shahnameh, of Ferdowsi; the magisterial odes of Khaqani; and the Khamseh, or Quintet, of Nezami and its many literary responses. Emphasizes close reading and analysis of the texts and their historical and cultural backgrounds.
prerequisites: NML360Y1 or adequate knowledge of Persian
